entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a 'tragic expression' and being 'preoccupied', indicating that he is troubled. Professor Trelawney also sees difficult times ahead for him, suggesting that Harry's worries are not baseless.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is described as having a 'mournful' tone and being able to see into the future, indicating that she has some sort of supernatural ability.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as rolling his eyes at Harry, suggesting that he may be skeptical or dismissive of Professor Trelawney's predictions.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is mentioned as sitting close to Professor Trelawney and admiring her, suggesting that she may be a fan or admirer of the professor.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is mentioned as sitting close to Professor Trelawney and admiring her, suggesting that she may be a fan or admirer of the professor.
